actionable_tasks.title: Implement Circuit Breaker Pattern for Provider Failover
actionable_tasks.description: Add a circuit breaker mechanism to the backend provider switching logic to automatically failover when a provider is unhealthy. This improves reliability and user experience during provider outages.
implementation_steps: Create a utility module for circuit breaker logic (track failures, open/close state).
Integrate circuit breaker checks into provider request flow.
Add configuration for failure thresholds and reset timeouts.
Test failover behavior with simulated provider errors.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Request Correlation IDs for End-to-End Tracing
actionable_tasks.description: Attach unique correlation IDs to each request in the backend chat pipeline to enable tracing across logs and metrics for debugging and observability.
implementation_steps: Generate a UUID for each incoming request.
Propagate the correlation ID through all relevant backend calls.
Log the correlation ID with each request and response.
Update documentation to describe tracing usage.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Automated Test Coverage for Provider Switching
actionable_tasks.description: Increase the number and scope of automated tests for provider switching and telemetry to ensure robust failover and metric reporting.
implementation_steps: Identify untested edge cases in provider switching logic.
Write new Jest tests for failover, error handling, and metric persistence.
Run tests and verify coverage improvements.
Update test documentation.

actionable_tasks.title: Frontend: Complete Spotify Authentication Interface
actionable_tasks.description: Finish the implementation of the Spotify OAuth login and token management UI to enable users to connect their Spotify accounts for music discovery.
implementation_steps: Implement OAuth flow and token storage in frontend state.
Add UI feedback for authentication success/failure.
Test integration with backend authentication endpoint.
Update user documentation for Spotify login.

actionable_tasks.title: Backend: Add MongoDB TTL Indexes for Telemetry Data Rotation
actionable_tasks.description: Implement TTL (Time-To-Live) indexes on MongoDB telemetry collections to automatically expire old data and optimize storage.
implementation_steps: Define TTL index on telemetry collections (e.g., expire after 30 days).
Apply index using MongoDB driver or migration script.
Test data expiration with sample records.
Document TTL configuration.
